de.dbis.services

Class Java2MySql

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.dbis.services.Java2MySql

  • public class Java2MySql
extends java.lang.Object
    Establishes connection to the MySql database. Uses 'dbconnection.properties' file for configuration.
